name: Consolidated reports; interrelated business Assessments, Refunds, and Records
text: §237-35  Consolidated reports; interrelated business.  When any taxpayer is engaged in two or more forms of business activity taxable under this chapter which are interrelated, or which are of like character, the taxpayer shall file a consolidated return covering all business activities, which are thus interrelated or of like character. [L 1935, c 141, §6(3); RL 1945, §5466; RL 1955, §117-30; HRS §237-35]
